TopicTitle: How do I embed an imgur album in a forum post?.

Articles.Content:
I think I've seen it done.

How do I embed the HTML code?

[NOPARSE][imgur=(albumcode Remember to take out the #0)][/NOPARSE]

5chars because it was whiny

Example:

[NOPARSE][imgur=eUc63][/NOPARSE]

yields:

[imgur=eUc63]

Also, if you're wondering how I got the tag to show up without making it actually happen, I used NOPARSE

EDIT: It's not working, but you should get the idea, it should pop up an imgur album

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-17T13:17:29Z" title="03/17/2015 01:17  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 17, 2015</time> by Norpo**
Sorry none of that seems to work, and are you suggesting I'm being whiny?

> 
> Sorry none of that seems to work, and are you suggesting I'm being whiny?

Hm, I must of forgotten how, i'll look at some old posts and see if I can figure it out.

And no, defenitely not, I was complaining that the 5 character limit was activated even though it was more than that, not you.

test:

[imgur=eUc63][/imgur]

EDIT: I figured it out!

[NOPARSE]

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/eUc63)

[/NOPARSE]
results in:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/eUc63)

(and eUc63 is just the imgur code)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-17T13:30:13Z" title="03/17/2015 01:30  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 17, 2015</time> by Norpo**

thanks!

I'll be using the heck out of that!

You should also be aware that imgur album embedding does not seem to work properly when enclosed in spoiler tags. You can embed single images inside spoilers without issue, but albums no worky.

Edit: Actually, putting albums in spoilers seems to be working better than when I last tried it. Still not perfect, but serviceable.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-25T17:33:42Z" title="03/25/2015 05:33  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 25, 2015</time> by Red Iron Crown**

You can test stuff like this in my thread: [The great forum test thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113844-The-great-forum-test-thread%21)

(Does anyone have a idea for a better name for it?)
